divs: Sighting DetailsI opened my back door at 11:52 PM and I Immediately spotted Two lights shoot up into the sky, The first light was red and the second was green. They both disappeared in the same spot. It was silent and no flash, solid bright red and green, brighter than the three lights on cell phone tower in background. I thought they were fireworks at first but then i was thinking more about it more and i was thinking that fireworks make noise, this didn't make a noise, it was silent. Fireworks Flash They didn't flash at all, they were both solid colors and did not fizzle out and fall like a firework, they disappeared before the arch started to fall. it was very odd and never see anything like it. I started feeling paranoid after it. Never had this feeling.We have a security camera for our cars but i checked and the angle we have, didn't catch anything. If i had my camera i wouldn't of had time to take the picture it was that fast. I reported to Mufon once before, but I'm pretty sure that was a meteorite, not a UFO. I don't know what this, but i have never seen a firework look like this, maybe a dud? or even a UFO
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Chester Springs
There were no other sightings in Chester Springs on or around March 21st 2010
Summary: Two lights shot up into sky and disappeared. 1st red followed by the 2nd green, No noise
